articles.author: Rakesh Patil
articles.title: Market LIVE Updates: Nifty around 17,150, Sensex up 300 pts; Asian Paints, L&T top gainers - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: All the sectoral indices are trading in the green.
articles.content:
• BSE Capital Goods index up 1 percent led by L&T, GMR Airports, Bharat Forge
  • Indices erase some of the early gains but still trading higher with Nifty around 17,150

articles.author: Sakshi Tiwari
articles.title: Australia To Spend An ‘Astronomical’ $368B For ‘Second-Hand’ Nuclear Submarines; Experts Slam ‘Trillion Dollar’ Debt Deal - EurAsian Times
articles.description: More than a year after the AUKUS pact was signed in September 2021, the US, UK, and Australia have finally revealed details of their plan to build a new fleet of nuclear-powered submarines for Australia. The price, however, is astronomical.

articles.title: CNN leaves out Michelle Yeoh's 'prime' jab at Don Lemon as anchor praises Asians winning big at the Oscars - Fox News
articles.description: CNN bent over backwards to avoid mentioning Michelle Yeoh's "prime" swipe at its embattled host Don Lemon following backlash he faced for his sexist comments last month.
articles.content:
CNN took an awkward sidestep in its coverage of the 95th Academy Awards as one of the night's biggest winners made a stunning jab at the network's embattled host Don Lemon.
